item.title: 早间竞标救市反弹中的麻烦迹象
item.description: Rae Wee 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Rae Wee】

item.title: 关税导致美国国债市场混乱，引发长期担忧
item.description: 本周，国债因关税问题而大幅下挫，导致全球最大的债券市场出现混乱，对冲基金平仓了一些由债务引发的押注，投资者对美国市场受到的持久损害表示担忧。【原文：The searing selloff in Treasuries this week in response to tariffs caused dislocations in the world’s biggest bond market, as hedge funds unwound some debt-fuelled bets and investors raised concerns about lasting damage to U.S. markets.】

item.title: 国际能源署称，全球贸易战可能给新兴的人工智能行业带来逆风
item.description: 国际能源机构（IEA）技术总监劳拉-科齐（Laura Cozzi）告诉路透社，全球关税战的升级可能会给新兴的数据中心行业带来挑战，并导致增长放缓。【原文：An escalating global tariff war could provide challenges for the emerging data centre sector and cause slower growth, Laura Cozzi, the International Energy Agency (IEA) Director of Technology told Reuters.】

item.title: 美国消费者价格在关税海啸前的 3 月份表现温和
item.description: 美国消费者价格在 3 月份可能略有上涨，但在唐纳德-特朗普总统加倍征收进口中国商品的关税，甚至降低对其他国家的关税之后，通胀风险偏向上行。【原文：U.S. consumer prices likely increased marginally in March, but inflation risks are tilted to the upside after President Donald Trump doubled down on tariffs on imported Chinese goods even as he lowered duties on other nations.】

item.title: 雷-达里奥呼吁美国与中国达成贸易协议
item.description: 全球最大对冲基金的创始人雷-达里奥（Ray Dalio）呼吁美国与中国就关税问题达成协议，并表示美国总统唐纳德-特朗普政府的下一个目标应该是将国家赤字削减至国内生产总值的 3%。【原文：Ray Dalio, founder of the world's largest hedge fund, called for a U.S. deal with the Chinese on tariffs and said that the next goal for U.S. President Donald Trump's administration should be to cut the country's deficit to 3% of GDP.】

item.title: 越南航空公司签署 3 亿美元融资协议，正与波音公司商谈扩大订单事宜
item.description: 越南廉价航空公司 Vietjet 周四表示，它已与投资基金 KKR 的合作伙伴 AV AirFinance 签署了一项价值 3 亿美元的协议，为其机队扩建提供资金。【原文：Vietnamese budget carrier Vietjet said on Thursday it has signed an agreement worth $300 million with AV AirFinance, a partner of investment fund KKR , to fund the expansion of its fleet.】

item.title: 阿克曼的 Pershing Square Holdings 基金今年迄今下跌近 14
item.description: 亿万富翁投资者比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场控股公司（Pershing Square Holdings）周三告诉投资者，该公司的投资组合今年迄今已亏损近 14%。【原文：Billionaire investor Bill Ackman's Pershing Square Holdings portfolio has lost nearly 14% so far this year, the firm told investors on Wednesday.】

item.title: 消息称 CATL 将获香港联交所批准 50 亿美元上市
item.description: 据两位直接知情人士透露，中国电池巨头 CATL 在香港上市融资至少 50 亿美元的计划将于本周四获得香港证券交易所的批准。【原文：Chinese battery giant CATL's Hong Kong listing to raise at least $5 billion is due to be approved by the city's stock exchange on Thursday, according to two sources with direct knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普在关税问题上做出让步，但继续保持对中国的贸易战热度
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）刚刚决定暂停对数十个国家征收高额关税，这一令人震惊的决定使得全球股市在周四大幅上扬，即使在他与世界第二大经济体中国的贸易战愈演愈烈之际也是如此。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump's stunning decision to pause the hefty duties he had just imposed on dozens of countries sent battered global stock markets surging on Thursday even as he ratcheted up a trade war with the world's No. 2 economy China.】

item.title: 澳大利亚拒绝中国 "联手 "对抗美国关税的提议
item.description: 澳大利亚周四拒绝了中国政府提出的合作应对美国关税的建议，并表示将继续实现贸易多元化，降低对最大贸易伙伴中国的依赖。【原文：Australia on Thursday declined Beijing's proposal to work together to counter U.S. tariffs, saying instead it would continue to diversify its trade and lower its reliance on China, its largest trading partner.】

item.title: 独家报道关税飙升，亚马逊上的中国卖家要么涨价要么撤出美国
item.description: 该协会表示，关税将严重影响中国的小型企业和制造商。【原文：The tariffs will severely impact China's small enterprises and manufacturers, the association said.】

item.title: 中美贸易战焦虑盖过关税转向，避险天堂反弹
item.description: 周四，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普突然暂停对其他许多国家征收关税90天后，交易员们又涌向日元和瑞士法郎等避险货币，并抛售了澳元。【原文：Traders swept back into safe havens like the yen and Swiss franc and sold the Australian dollar on Thursday, after U.S. President Donald Trump ramped up his trade war against China even as he abruptly paused tariffs for 90 days on many other nations.】

item.title: 中国 3 月份居民消费价格涨幅扩大
item.description: 3 月份，中国居民消费价格连续第二个月下降，而生产者通货紧缩持续存在，在关税风险日益加剧的情况下，人们对经济前景的谨慎情绪与日俱增。【原文：China's consumer prices fell for the second straight month in March while producer deflation persisted, as caution grows over the economic outlook amid mounting tariff risks.】

item.title: 特朗普升级对华贸易战，油价下跌
item.description: 尽管美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布暂停对其他国家征收 90 天的关税，但他还是加紧了与中国的贸易战，导致油价周四下跌了约 1%。【原文：Oil prices fell around 1% on Thursday as U.S. President Donald Trump ramped up a trade war with China, even as he announced a 90-day pause on tariffs aimed at other countries.】

item.title: 特朗普暂停加征关税后，股市出现缓解性反弹
item.description: 周四，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普表示将暂时降低他刚刚对数十个国家征收的高额关税后，全球股市反弹，美元站稳了脚跟，狂热的债券抛售也趋于稳定。【原文：Global stocks rallied, the dollar found footing and a manic bond selloff stabilised on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump said he would temporarily lower the hefty duties he had just imposed on dozens of countries.】

item.title: 恶劣天气阻碍亚马逊发射首颗 Kuiper 互联网卫星
item.description: 联合发射联盟（United Launch Alliance）称，亚马逊周三因恶劣天气推迟了首批27颗Kuiper互联网卫星的发射。【原文：Amazon on Wednesday had its launch of the first 27 initial Kuiper internet satellites postponed over bad weather, the launch provider United Launch Alliance said.】

item.title: 保罗-魏斯律师事务所公益事业负责人在特朗普协议后辞职
item.description: Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison 律师事务所的公益业务负责人周三表示，他将从这家华尔街律师事务所辞职，而就在几周前，该事务所与共和党籍的美国总统唐纳德-特朗普达成协议，以逃避危及其业务的行政命令。【原文：The head of the pro bono practice at Paul, Weiss, Rifkind, Wharton & Garrison said on Wednesday he was resigning from the Wall Street law firm just weeks after it struck a deal with Republican U.S. President Donald Trump to escape an executive order imperiling its business.】

item.title: 特朗普暂停加征关税后，日本股市日经指数大涨，令市场松了一口气
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布对许多国家立即暂停征收 90 天的关税后，对美国关税对经济影响的担忧减弱，日本日经平均股价周四跳涨。【原文：Japan's Nikkei share average jumped on Thursday as worries about the economic impact of U.S. tariffs receded after President Donald Trump declared an immediate 90-day tariff pause for many countries.】

item.title: 关税暂停，美越同意启动贸易协议谈判
item.description: 在美国暂停对越南出口产品征收 46%的关税 90 天后，越南政府周四表示，美国和越南已同意启动贸易协定谈判。【原文：The United States and Vietnam have agreed to launch negotiations for a trade agreement, the Vietnamese government said on Thursday, hours after the U.S. paused the implementation of a 46% tariff rate on Vietnam's exports for 90 days.】

item.title: 中国与欧盟讨论贸易问题，将恢复电动汽车谈判
item.description: 中国商务部表示，中国商务部长周二通过视频电话与欧盟贸易和经济安全委员马罗斯-塞夫科维奇（Maros Sefcovic）举行了会谈。【原文：China's commerce minister had talks with the European trade and economic security commissioner Maros Sefcovic on Tuesday via a video call, the Chinese ministry said.】

item.title: 尼加拉瓜总统奥尔特加会见华为高管
item.description: 据官方媒体周三报道，尼加拉瓜总统丹尼尔-奥尔特加在马那瓜会见了由华为（HWT.UL）高管组成的中国代表团。【原文：Nicaraguan President Daniel Ortega met with a Chinese delegation in Managua, made up of Huawei (HWT.UL) executives, official media reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 日本批发通胀加速，显示成本压力持续存在
item.description: 日本 3 月份的年度批发通胀率达到 4.2%，比上月有所加快，这表明成本压力持续存在，加剧了美国关税政策不确定性给企业带来的痛苦。【原文：Japan's annual wholesale inflation hit 4.2% in March, accelerating from the previous month in a sign of persistent cost pressures that add to corporate pain from uncertainty over U.S. tariff policy.】

item.title: OpenAI 反诉埃隆-马斯克，声称受到骚扰
item.description: OpenAI 周三反诉埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk），称马斯克有骚扰行为，并要求联邦法官阻止马斯克对 OpenAI 采取任何 "进一步的非法和不公平行动"。【原文：OpenAI countersued Elon Musk on Wednesday, citing a pattern of harassment by Musk and asking a federal judge to stop Musk from any "further unlawful and unfair action" against OpenAI in a court case over the future structure of the firm that helped launch the AI revolution.】

item.title: 受关税影响，科罗娜啤酒制造商星座集团预计年度利润低于预期
item.description: 酿酒商星座品牌公司（Constellation Brands）周三预测，2026 财年的利润将低于分析师的预期，预计特朗普政府征收的巨额税款将打击其啤酒和烈酒业务。【原文：Brewer Constellation Brands on Wednesday forecast fiscal 2026 profit below analysts' estimates, expecting steep levies imposed by the Trump administration to hit its beers and spirits business.】

item.title: 特朗普暂停部分关税的内容
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三突然暂停了他对全球贸易伙伴的部分关税攻击，将许多国家商品的关税税率下调了90天，以便为降低贸易壁垒留出谈判空间，尽管他对中国商品加征的新关税达到了125%。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday abruptly paused part of his tariff assault on global trading partners, dialing back duty rates on goods from many countries for 90 days to allow room to negotiate lower trade barriers, even as he hiked new tariffs on Chinese goods to 125%.】

item.title: 交易日：繁荣！特朗普暂停加征关税引发怪物级反弹
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 特朗普表示不希望看到美国钢铁流向日本
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，他不希望美国钢铁公司（U.S. Steel Corp）被日本收购，这表明他不再支持新日铁收购这家美国钢铁生产商。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday that he does not want U.S. Steel Corp to go to Japan, suggesting he no longer supports Nippon Steel's bid for the American steel producer.】

item.title: 特朗普称 TikTok 协议仍 "在讨论中
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三表示，在分拆 TikTok 美国资产的潜在交易被搁置数日后，该交易仍 "摆在桌面上"。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday said a potential deal to spin off the U.S. assets of TikTok is still "on the table" days after it was put on hold.】

item.title: 特朗普没有暂停征收 25% 的美国汽车关税，招致密歇根商界和汽车团体的批评
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三将多项关税暂停90天，但并未停止对汽车进口征收25%的关税以及即将对汽车零部件征收的关税，这招致了密歇根州商界和汽车团体的批评。【原文：President Donald Trump on Wednesday paused for 90 days many tariffs but is not halting 25% tariffs on automotive imports and looming tariffs on auto parts, drawing criticism from Michigan business and auto groups.】

item.title: 特朗普签署行政命令放宽新市场进入者门槛
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）周三签署了几项行政命令和公告，重点是放松对市场的管制，其中包括一项旨在确保联邦法规不会阻碍企业进入新市场的行政命令和公告。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday signed several executive orders and proclamations focused on deregulating markets, including one aimed at ensuring federal regulations do not block entrants from entering new markets.】
